org.rdkit.knime.util

Class ChemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.util.ChemUtils

  • public final class ChemUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides chemistry related utility functions.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Method Detail

      • isSmiles

        public static boolean isSmiles(java.lang.String value)
        Determines for the passed in string, if it is a valid Smiles string.
        Parameters:
        value - Potential smiles string.
        Returns:
        True, if the passed in string is Smiles compatible. False otherwise.

      • isCtab

        public static boolean isCtab(java.lang.String value)
        Determines for the passed in string, if it is a valid CTab string.
        Parameters:
        value - Potential CTab string.
        Returns:
        True, if the passed in string is CTab compatible. False otherwise.

      • createReactionFromSmarts

        public static ChemicalReaction createReactionFromSmarts(java.lang.String strRxnSmarts,
                                                        int iRequiredReactantsTemplates)
                                                 throws InvalidSettingsException
        Creates an RDKit Chemical Reaction from a the SMARTS value provided by the model #m_modelOptionalReactionSmartsPattern. After creation it will be validated.
        Parameters:
        strRxnSmarts - Reaction smarts. Can be null to fail with exception.
        iRequiredReactantsTemplates - Number of reactants templates that are expected to be found in the chemical reaction.
        Returns:
        Chemical reaction object. Never null.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - Thrown, if the reaction could not be created from the SMARTS value of the model or if it is invalid for another reason.

      • readReactionFromTable

        public static ChemicalReaction readReactionFromTable(BufferedDataTable table,
                                                     InputDataInfo inputDataInfo,
                                                     int iRequiredReactantsTemplates)
                                              throws InvalidSettingsException,
                                                     InputDataInfo.EmptyCellException
        Reads an RDKit Chemical Reaction from a the Rxn or SMARTS value provided by the first row of the passed in table. After creation it will be validated.
        Parameters:
        table - Table with reaction smart.
        inputDataInfo - Data info to access reaction column.
        iRequiredReactantTemplates - Number of reactants templates that are expected to be found in the chemical reaction.
        Returns:
        Chemical reaction object. Never null.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - Thrown, if the reaction could not be created from the SMARTS value of the model or if it is invalid for another reason.
        InputDataInfo.EmptyCellException

      • readReactionsFromTable

        public static ChemicalReaction[] readReactionsFromTable(BufferedDataTable table,
                                                        InputDataInfo inputDataInfo,
                                                        int iRequiredReactantsTemplates,
                                                        WarningConsolidator warnings,
                                                        WarningConsolidator.Context warningContext)
                                                 throws InvalidSettingsException,
                                                        InputDataInfo.EmptyCellException
        Reads all RDKit Chemical Reactions from Rxn or SMARTS values provided by the passed in table. After creation it will be validated. If the last parameter is true it will ignore invalid reactions and just read on, otherwise it would through an exception.
        Parameters:
        table - Table with reaction smart.
        inputDataInfo - Data info to access reaction column.
        iRequiredReactantTemplates - Number of reactants templates that are expected to be found in the chemical reaction.
        warnings - Optional warning consolidator. If set, invalid reactions will cause warnings.
        warningContext - Optional warning context to be used when saving warnings.
        Returns:
        Array of chemical reaction objects. Never null and never empty.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - Thrown, if no reaction could not be created from the RXn or SMARTS values of the table.
        InputDataInfo.EmptyCellException

      • validateReaction

        public static void validateReaction(ChemicalReaction rxn,
                                    int iRequiredReactantsTemplates)
                             throws InvalidSettingsException
        Validates the specified reaction. One of the validations is to check the number of reactants templates, which can be passed in.
        Parameters:
        rxn - Reaction to be validated. Must not null to succeed.
        iRequiredReactantTemplates - Number of reactants templates that are expected to be found in the chemical reaction.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - Thrown, if the passed in reaction is null or if validation failed.

      • reverseAtomList

        public static UInt_Vect reverseAtomList(ROMol mol,
                                        UInt_Vect atomList)
        Reverses the specified atom index list for the specified molecule.
        Parameters:
        mol - Molecule with atoms. Can be null to return null.
        atomList - Atom index list. Can be null to return a list with all atom indexes.
        Returns:
        Atom index list that contains all atom indexes that are not in the specified list.
